request.description:
Retrieve data user. Parameter optional yang digunakan:

*   role -> jika terisi, get user berdasarkan role (value: user, admin, dst)
*   iduser -> jika terisi, get user berdasarkan id user
    

Jika parameter role dan iduser tidak terisi (kosong) -> get all user

response.name: get all user
response.body:
{
    "meta": {
        "code": 200,

response.name: get specific user
update data user
insert new user
delete user

request.description:
Retrieve data kegiatan. Parameter optional:

*   type -> jika terisi, get kegiatan berdasarkan type (value: matching, assessment)
*   status -> jika terisi, get kegiatan berdasarkan status (value: inactive, active, done)
    

Jika parameter type & status nya kosong (tidak terisi) -> get all kegiatan

response.name: get kegiatan with specific type & status
get kegiatan with certain status
get all kegiatan
insert new kegiatan
update data kegiatan (error)
update data kegiatan (success)
delete kegiatan
Get Alokasi Matching - 1 (Empty)
Get Alokasi Matching - 2
Insert / Update Alokasi Matching
Get data matching
